casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Restoney ROBINSON. No. 129P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, William D. Kenerly, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of March 2005 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2005."
